verbs.description: President Donald Trump 's administration [V: should] focus on pushing for structural changes in China rather than on the massive trade imbalance between the world 's two largest economies , a former U.S. government official said Monday .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's administration] [ARGM-MOD: should] [V: focus] [ARG2: on pushing for structural changes in China rather than on the massive trade imbalance between the world 's two largest economies] , a former U.S. government official said Monday .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump 's administration] should focus on [V: pushing] [ARG1: for structural changes in China] rather than on the massive trade imbalance between the world 's two largest economies , a former U.S. government official said Monday .
